title: Pretty colour palettes
text: {PrettyCols} R package containing aesthetically pleasing colour palettes. structure package based code {PNWColors}, {wesanderson}, {MetBrewer} packages.

title: Pretty colour palettes
text: Install using: See nrennie.github.io/PrettyCols full documentation.

title: Complete list of palettes. — PrettyColsPalettes
text: Use names(PrettyColsPalettes) return palette names. Current choices : MoodyBlues, PrettyPurples, Tangerines

Generates the colour palettes — prettycols
text: name Name Palette. Run names(PrettyColsPalettes) view options. n Number desired colors. number requested colors beyond scope palette, colors automatically interpolated. n provided, length palette used. type Either "continuous" "discrete". Use continuous want automatically interpolate colors. Default "discrete" direction Sets order colors. Default palette 1. direction -1, palette color order reversed
